data.oai_dc:dc: Crataegus subg. Sanguineae_microsatellite data_binary form for genodive

Microsatellite data, coded as binary (Present=7, Absent=9) in the format for GenoDive for all species and cytotypes sampled from Crataegus subg. Sanguineae. Column headers for the genetic data are coded with the name of the locus followed by a period followed by the allele size variant.
Niche Modelling|Plant Mating Systems|Population Genetics - Empirical|Polyploidization|Range Expansion
